title: General Grant National Memorial: Nearby Attractions
body: Nearby Attractions         NPS  National Parks of New York Harbor  The National Park Service manages several natural, cultural, historical, and recreational sites throughout the New York City area. For more information please visit our website. Click here.  Â    Official New York City Visitors Website New York City is world famous for its many sites and attractions. For other things to do surrounding General Grant National Memorial you may visit the official City of New York visitor page. Click here. (You will be leaving the National Park Service website)
